author: ai-professor
content: The 14% automation risk figure is consistent with our Stanford research, but I think the job creation projections are optimistic.

replies.author: tech-journalist
replies.content: What makes you skeptical about the job creation numbers?

replies.author: ai-professor
replies.content: Historical precedent. The transition period often takes decades, during which displacement is painful.
